column4: Hi - can someone point me to an article on how ubuntu synchronizes its system time in a networked environment?
How do I force re-synchronization with the Windows master time server? I noticed one of my ubuntu servers is off by a few minutes and that concerns me.
It has something to do with the ntp service. Look about restarting it, perhaps, assuming the windows master is in the configurations.
thanks, I'll read up on ntp.
